name: The Climb (itch) (Wandering_Owl, Veguista, CoderCat, Indibulous)
description:
The Climb is a multiplayer platformer in which players control two climbers trying to reach the top of a mountain. They must work together to create ropes and climb past obstacles in order to get to the final platform.

Gameplay

Both players start at the bottom of a mountain. One player has the ability to move and jump, and the other player has the ability to throw a rope. If a player throws a rope to the other successfully, a rope is created between the two of them. The controls then swap over, so the player who threw the rope can now move, and the player who was moving must now throw a rope to them. 

Game controls  Red character:

WASD keys to move

Space key to climb/create rope

Click to confirm rope

Blue character:

Arrow keys to move

Right Ctrl key to climb/create rope

Click to confirm rope
